cgMDR:cgDatatype.cgMDR:datatype_description: The string datatype represents character strings in XML. The 路value space路 of string is the set of finite-length sequences of characters (as defined in [XML 1.0 (Second Edition)]) that 路match路 the Char production from [XML 1.0 (Second Edition)]. A character is an atomic unit of communication; it is not further specified except to note that every character has a corresponding Universal Character Set code point, which is an integer.
